mapper.insert: insert into tb_company (branch_srl, name, zonecode, addr, addr_detail, phone) values (#{branch_srl}, #{name}, #{zonecode}, #{addr}, #{addr_detail}, #{phone})
mapper.select: select company_srl from tb_company where name=#{name} order by created_at desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into tb_warranty (company_srl, name, img_path, rank, lat, lng) values (#{company_srl}, #{name}, '', #{rank}, #{lat}, #{lng})
mapper.select: select company_srl, name as company_nm from tb_company where branch_srl=#{branch_srl}
select warranty_srl, name as warranty_nm from tb_warranty where company_srl=#{company_srl}
